title: Matt Ingebretson & Jake Weisman | A Closer Look: Trump and GOP Face Fallout from His Racist Immigration Comments
description:
Seth takes a closer look at how Trump has pulled off another successful pivot - this time from a conversation about whether he's mentally unstable to a conversation about the fact that he's a racist.

Then, Corporate's Matt Ingebretson and Jake Weisman talk about making the transition from comedians to actors and reveal their previous horrible corporate jobs.

After that, they take a few more questions backstage.
